message.password-min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
message.password-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
message.password-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
message.password-number: Password must contain at least one number
message.password-special: Password must contain at least one special character
message.verify-success: Great! Your email address has been verified. Your account is now active and ready to use.

description.forgot-password: Enter your email to get password reset link
description.verify-email: Enter your email to get email verification link
